title: Overture
creator_credit: United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
brief_description: Beethoven’s “Egmont Overture”, played by the Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Carl Schuricht, is a musical background for scenes symbolising the work of the United Nations in combating disease, ignorance, war, devastation, starvation and misery.
